section.title: Examples

para.command: kdb set -c "My first key" user/example/key "Some nice value"
kdb set user:luciana/example/key -- "Some - nice - value with dashes"
kdb set -u nobody -g http user:httpd/sw/httpd/key "Some value"

section.para: bash# kdb ln system/sw/XFree/handmade system/sw/XFree/current # same as last command

para.command: kdb export user/sw/app | sed -e 's|/app/|/app2/|g' | kdb import
